website_summaries.verdict: Exactly what you'd expect from Rubbermaid – a quality product that optimizes storage in your kitchen. The best set you can buy.
pros: manufactured by a trusted name in kitchen storage
Offers shatterproof Tritan plastic that is BPA free
Easy to store and stack to make the most of space
cons: Hot food items may loosen the lids, but allowing food to cool a bit prior to storage solves this small issue

website_summaries.verdict: Not only are these easy to lock and clean, they're made specifically to stack together for easy organization – key for successful meal prep.
pros: Glass bottoms are safe up to 425º F – perfect for using in the oven
A variety of sizes to hold full meals as well as small snacks
cons: Some consumers wish they were bigger

website_summaries.verdict: These highly rated containers offer top-capacity storage from a reputable company.
pros: Colorful lids are easy to find and snap onto glass containers
Many of the lids share the same size
Glass containers are safe in oven up to 425°F
cons: Not the best containers for microwave or freezer use

customer_reviews.title: Shattered sitting in fridge!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these sets to replace all my plastic. All was well for that last few months until I opened the fridge today and saw that a container holding potato salad was shattered. All the other jars, glass bottles, glass containers in the fridge were fine. Just this one. There was glass everywhere. I'm still finding pieces! I had to throw away all the food that was not covered or was in produce containers. There is no warning about this. It only happened to one container - but even 1 is too much. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Anon77

customer_reviews.title: Shattered in microwave
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these three months ago, and have used them only lightly. Today, one of the 1.5 cup units shattered in less than 2 minutes when microwaving rice at 50% power. Generally speaking, I do not like tiny shards of glass in my food. I will not trust any more of these in the microwave, which severely decreases their usefulness. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Pontifex

customer_reviews.title: THIS PRODUCT IS EXTREMELY DANGEROUS
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE!!!! Do NOT purchase this item. As others have previously described, this product with SHATTER!!! I was washing our dishes and just finished washing one of the larger bowls. I placed it onto our drying rack and it SHATTERED!!!! Luckily I was not looking at it or I surely would have sustained some serious damage. The glass was EVERYWHERE! We had to remove everything from the surrounding area as it was littered with glass. PLEASE BE AWARE. DO NOT BE FOOLED BY THE OVERALL RATING OF THIS PRODUCT LIKE WE WERE. IT IS EXTREMELY DANGEROUS AND WE ARE VERY LUCKY NO ONE GOT HURT. These pictures only represent a fraction of the pieces we had to pick up.
customer_reviews.author: Medstudent2013

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT MICROWAVE
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for about 1 month. I put one of the smaller containers in my microwave for 1 minute and 20 seconds in, it explodes into a thousand pieces!!! The description says they are microwave safe but they are clearly not!
customer_reviews.author: Carimina

customer_reviews.title: It's really good
customer_reviews.text: I use these quite often and it works great. My only compliant is that it can be difficult to seal if you try to store hot food in it as the lid likes to pop off due to the heat/pressure. If you like to store food immediately after cooking I would recommend letting it cool off or using a plastic product. Note: I have seen people on here complain about the containers exploding in the microwave. I have yet to have one explode in the microwave and I've even used them in the oven a couple of times(no more than 350F) with no issues. It's possible people are buying knockoffs from 3rd party sellers.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Allen

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, big disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set a few years ago and love them. So there was no hesitation to buy another set. As soon as I received them, I knew something was not right. The package was horrible. Like everything wasn't fit properly in the box, the top was bulging out. Half of the small lids, the rubber were wrinkled. Half of the small containers were misshapen, therefore they couldn't stack up properly. With misshapen containers and wrinkled lids, they weren't leak proof! The lids didn't lock on each other, nor stayed closed on the containers! The glass weren't smooth. Just everything about them was very low quality.
customer_reviews.author: OregonGrown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the storage containers I have purchased over the years these are by far the best quality. The Pyrex bowls are heavy though so be careful. The lids snap together for easy storage and I love the inside seal verses the old snap over the top ones, works much better. The bowls stack very nicely compared to the old round ones and seem to hold a lot more food for the same dimension. Would like to see some shorter rectangular bowls for keeping things like meat marinades or leftover meat items. Bought several of the other sizes in this style as well. Nicely done Rubbermaid!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I don't like is the lids
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like is the lids. Not the greatest fitment imho. You have to be careful how much you place in them as the lid robs a bit of space just by itself..and or if you do have some food blockage; it won't seat itself properly. As far as some complaining about it exploding...seriously...it's glass. Rapid temperature changes will affect any glass. I've had glass containers for decades and have NEVER had such problems. Rubbermaid knows their stuff. It's easy to clean; much betterthan cheap plastic, doesn't discolor, food enzymes don't get trapped in pores like the plastics either. Exercising common sense; these should last you for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Greaat Storage Containers
customer_reviews.text: I love these storage containers! These containers are great for serving dishes, storage and travel. They are so much better than the plastic storage containers which stain and become misshaped. The sizes are just right for saving left overs and the variety of sizes make it easy to take left overs to lunch. The other plus for these containers is that they stack perfectly and the lids fit together. I love clean cabinets and these containers make it easy to stay organized.
customer_reviews.author: Julikins

customer_reviews.title: Exploded in the microwave.
customer_reviews.text: Was reheating vegetables for 2 minutes, didn't have a lid on (so no pressure buildup), and then kaboom, razor sharp shards of glass all over the microwave. These shards then fell out when I opened the microwave and ended up in my toe. Also, the lids don't alway feel super secure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best-designed food storage units I've seen
customer_reviews.text: Food storage containers abound, so I'll limit my comments to the reason I felt this set deserved 5 stars: Reinforced lids: The plastic + rubber lids resist buckling or warping. They seem as sturdy as the glass containers, themselves. Perfect shapes for nesting: The tapered shape and rounded edges make it easy to group empty containers without having to be precise. Additional rubber "bumpers" on the lids aid stacking: The base of each unit fits neatly into a rubber seal on the lid of the unit below it to prevent sliding. That's it. If there's a better designed collection out there, I haven't seen it.
customer_reviews.author: Newbian

customer_reviews.title: Great set, but missing a lid!
customer_reviews.text: Rubbermaid is generallly very good quality. Built to last. I have owned various pieces of this set but dropped one and needed to replace it. These containers are solid, very thick with nice stackable lids. My problem is that the lids on the larger sizes aren’t as airtight and my order contained only 21 pieces. This is not amazons fault as the box was in pristine shape, unfortunately one of my small sizes is missing a lid. That is not good since it’s impossible to find replacement lids. So be careful and count your pieces to make sure you aren’t missing a lid like I was. Not sure what to do now.
customer_reviews.author: abcdefg

customer_reviews.title: So much better than plastic containers.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these when we switched from plastic containers due to the smell and stains they always had. These are great and are so easy to clean. As with any other glass item, be careful with handling and stacking but we love them. They go right into the dishwasher so cleanup is super easy and I no longer have to soak plastic bowls to remove stains or smells. I did have one that was warped a little but it doesn’t seem to affect the functionality so I didn’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: KKL—L&L’s Little Shop of Goodies- Living Life RV Rentals

customer_reviews.title: Broken glass
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set about 18 months ago. Within 2-3 months one of the bowls had a sliver of glass break off the lip while in the dishwasher, but it was no big deal so we continued using it. Yesterday I had the largest bowl soaking in the sink and after a minute or two I heard a loud pop. I looked and found the bowl had exploded in the sink, and several pieces were on the counter. I ended up having to remove our disposal to get all of the glass pieces out. I dont know that I would recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to fit lids
customer_reviews.text: These bowls have a lid that's awkward to use and hard to take off. I'm afraid the bowl will fly out of my hands every time I try to remove the lid. I've started using the lids from my plastic Rubbermaid set. Much better. Too bad they didn't keep the same design for these bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not how suction...IT LEAKS!!
customer_reviews.text: I guess if you keep it perfectly still it would be great. But I traveled with it. and it got bumped around in my bag, and the content spilled all over the place. The idea of suction holding the lid in place es no bueno. especially if any of the content happen to get on the lid while covering... suction then is almost impossible. I didn't use it right away so I found out too late, now I am stuck with it, and now purchasing a different set.
customer_reviews.author: I Spy

customer_reviews.title: Say goodby to plastic forever !!!
customer_reviews.text: We got so tired of stained and malformed containers make of plastic ... not to mention that you should not use them in the microwave, we decided enough is enough. We bought this package as a "starter" set ... could not be happier. They are so much nicer than the plastic crap that is out there today I cannot begin to tell you. These are make with heavy glass containers with tops that seal like no plastic container ever did! We will use our old plastic containers for foods etc. that we give to friends and tell them, "please do not return them"!
customer_reviews.author: Montanan

customer_reviews.title: We use this exclusively for food storage
customer_reviews.text: We love this brand, it seals securely, and washes cleanly. They are thick and solid - as durable as glass can be. They do take up more space than your gladware-type containers, but that is the trade off for something that has more substance.
customer_reviews.author: Lael Beckwith

customer_reviews.title: Use with caution
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 2 of these sets, and love them. However, I did have a problem today with one piece and I don't think I did anything wrong. I placed a 1.5c bowl in the microwave for 1 minute to reheat potatoes; it was not quite half full. After 35 seconds, the bowl burst into shards and pieces. There was no metal, foil, or liquid in or around the bowl. And the lid was over the bowl off-setting the corners for ventilation. Thought it was worth noting the caution to other users.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Eubanks

customer_reviews.title: These are the best
customer_reviews.text: We're replacing all of our old plastic containers with this product. We bought a set about a year ago; they work as described and bring organization to our storage container drawer. We're in quarantine cleanup/simplify mode, and these answer that call. We've never experienced the "exploding" described by some commenters. I cook every day for an extended family and love this product, have only had satisfactory experiences. Buy with confidence, they work beautifully and as described.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Gooding

customer_reviews.title: Don't like those lids
customer_reviews.text: Good quality storage containers but I hate those lids. They are difficult to get fully sealed, and you have to leave room enough room at the top for the lid to sink into the container. I am passing on buying any more of these in favor of snap or glass lock lidded ones. But, that being said, they nest quite nicely, the lids snap together for storage, and they heat evenly. Anything stored within, if the cover is on correctly, is well sealed but not liquid water tight (liquids will still leak).
customer_reviews.author: amanda77kr

customer_reviews.title: Broke very easily
customer_reviews.text: I still have a couple of these left from a few years ago. I had multiple containers break in the microwave and some break when being moved around in the sink. I bought them when they were on sale for a cheap price. I wouldn't pay full price for these..
customer_reviews.author: coffeem8zzz

customer_reviews.title: Best storage containers I’ve ever had!
customer_reviews.text: This set was a gift for my sister-in-law because I love my own. I like these because I can warm, serve and store leftovers in them, and I can put them in the dishwasher. I can also freeze food in them. Much better all around than the plastic storage containers.
customer_reviews.author: MsDiz

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, would never buy any other food storage unit.
customer_reviews.text: I had some of these glass units with a different style lid. I like this much more, it is another HOME RUN for Rubbermaid one of my favorite product lines. The glass containers are so much easier to clean and I can tell when it is clean. They are so nice compared to plastic storage units, which always seemed to me they just looked dirty. The small units are great for a partial lemon or lime, tomatoes keep well compared to other containers, in part it is with the clear bottom, I can see what's in it. So I am not throwing stuff out. It was a lightning deal so the price per unit was low, it made sense.
customer_reviews.author: Edd Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good but sealing quality variable.
customer_reviews.text: Good containers but the lids kept me from giving a 5 star rating. There are two main problems. 1. On the 1 & 1.5 cup the seal is very good. So good that getting the lid off is difficult. Sometimes I feel like I need a crowbar to break the seal. 2. The 4 cup and 5.5 cup don't seal well. I can almost flick them off with a finger. 3. The 2.5 cup container is the only one that works the way I would like them to work. A good seal, but easy to open.
customer_reviews.author: Walt J 336

customer_reviews.title: Lids don't fit tightly
customer_reviews.text: The lids dont fit as tightly as they should on some of them and easily pop open on their own. I would not reccomend using them for anything with liquid or using them in a lunch bag. If they're just going to chill in the fridge, then they're great.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: These have finally convinced me to toss my nasty plastic containers.
customer_reviews.text: This set has a great variety of sizes for all types of food storage. I have only recently converted to using glass containers and I am now ready to toss my nasty old plastic containers now that I have these! I love that they stack so well together, and that the lids snap together so I can easily locate them. Also, there are only two sizes of lids, so you don't have to keep searching for the lid that matches the container. I am using these every day for my lunches. They work great for cold salads etc. or hot meals. They are a bit heavier than plastic, but I don't mind.
customer_reviews.author: 3pnutsinNH

customer_reviews.title: Dish exploded
customer_reviews.text: The lids, even though they "vacuum seal" do not stay on when carried in a lunch bag, or if they are bumped on the side of the lid by another container. I also had one explode into shards of glass on me the other day. It was not exposed to any extreme temperatures, I had been slicing up watermelon and dropped a small piece in the container and it shattered. It was all over my kitchen, stuck in my arms and in my clothes. Very scary and upsetting experience
customer_reviews.author: Emily and Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Exploding glass Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I had a Rubbermaid glass container sitting on the counter after I pulled it out of the refrigerator about a hour before and it was sitting on the counter for at least 45 minuets and it just exploded on the counter. The glass was everywhere!!! The container was empty, I had chicken salad unit before. Beware, I have many of these same same Rubbermaid containers but will be contacting Rubbermaid about this.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Best Food Storage Containers
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They match my red kitchen, the glassware is microwaveable and I'm not scared of getting plastic chemicals in my food. The seal is great, so no leaks yet and food stays fresh for a good while. They don't have a lot of crevices or ridges, so they're easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: missmopar05

customer_reviews.title: So much better than plastic
customer_reviews.text: These are a great alternative to the usual plastic Tupperware that gets cloudy and stained after one use with a red sauce and dishwashing. The seal is effective but the lids aren't very secure - it doesn't take much effort to open them. Depending on your personal feelings I suppose that could be good or bad. The dishes stack together and lids snap together nicely for storage. However I have already chipped one of the dishes while stacking so be careful there.
customer_reviews.author: CLA

customer_reviews.title: Great for Baking and Storing Food
customer_reviews.text: Received the first set of these as a gift and was so impressed I looked for more on Amazon and found at a great price. Loved these before I even purchased them here on Amazon. Glass container can be used to store and bake. Tops seal air tight. I also like the ones with the tops that snap on with the tabs but over time came to realize that those are a pain to store. These stack very nicely when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: they LAST and keep food FRESH
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these! I've had the old ones for years that are similar that Rubbermaid makes, but the advantages to these is, they don't breakdown in the microwave. The others get ugly when you overheat, but these stay shiny and new from fridge, to microwave, to dishwasher. And I love that they have a suction type closure. Highly recommend. I bought for each of my three daughters, too. Will definitely being filling my cupboards with just these and giving away the others! I'll keep watching for another lightning deal! LOVE AMAZON!
customer_reviews.author: Lortega

customer_reviews.title: Switching from plastic to glass - first purchase of glass storage
customer_reviews.text: These are one of two glass sets I've purchased. The glass is quite heavy. They stack as shown in the pictures which is nice when there are a lot of them in the refrigerator. The main drawback is the way the lids attach. Sometimes they do not seal very well. I prefer my 'round' set of glass storage containers with a simple plastic lid.
customer_reviews.author: HeyRenee

customer_reviews.title: These are not leak proof.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try these out. They looked so nice and we love that they stack neatly. Our first day using these we had both containers leak on us. Not bad for a $45 set right? I would not suggest these for anyone who needs a leak proof seal. Really, if you are getting these you might as well just buy them as bowls.
customer_reviews.author: John Ra

customer_reviews.title: Like some other reviewers
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a glass container, this is one of your few options. Like some other reviewers, I had one blow up on me in the microwave after being in there for 2 minutes (the little one, I believe it was a 1.5 cup size), but I've had the larger ones in the microwave for 5 minutes with no issues. Hit or miss I guess. I wanted glass because it's easier to clean. Not worth the hassle of dealing with warranty (seems as this is a more stressful process than it's worth) because customer service is so lacking with this company. If you want somewhat inexpensive glass containers, these are ok, but unreliable it seems.
customer_reviews.author: Jason K Lau

customer_reviews.title: Great storage solution
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to replace our old plastic Rubbermaid set. The old set was functional, but old and the plastic had started to trap odors. Really wanted to switch to glass and I was very happy when I found this set. The lids form a very tight seal and are easy to put on and take off. The lids also snap together and then snap into the base of the container. They are a huge space saver in our cabinet. They also sell additions to this set in different sizes and I plan to purchase those in the future.
customer_reviews.author: HelloHello

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Just like other reviewers have mentioned
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Just like other reviewers have mentioned, packaging could be better. Most of the pieces had a piece of cardboard in between them, but they didn't put it in between two of the pieces, and the lower one had a visible scratch/minor crack. It was minor and the crack didn't go all the way through and it all cleaned up nicely so I kept it. But as of March 2017 they still haven't quite figured out the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with the variety of sizes in this 22 piece ...
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the variety of sizes in this 22 piece set. Unfortunately 3 of the lids do not seal as tightly as the others; the rubber around the edge is a bit warped. I called rubbermaid to see if I could get replacement lids and was told that they don't offer them. I needed to send the whole package back to amazon and request a replacement for the whole set. How annoying?! I am keeping the set and just using the funky lids for food storage at home and the ones that do seal well I will use for on-the-go lunches.
customer_reviews.author: nickimh

customer_reviews.title: Nice jars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! The sizes are all useful. It is obvious that Rubbermaid put a lot of thought into the design of these containers, but they should have made the lids a little more secure. They sometimes slip up a little, especially if there is some oil on the inside of the glass at the top. Maybe they should have put ribs in the top of the glass to catch the lids. But this is a minor problem because they seal fine when cold in the fridge or freezer. I'll buy more since I haven't found anything else nearly as good.
customer_reviews.author: Maecenas

customer_reviews.title: These are working great for me
customer_reviews.text: These are working great for me. They nest perfectly together. I've been trying to replace old food storage containers (pre-BPA-free) with glass or BPA-free plastic. Although the directions state the plastic lids are top-rack dishwasher safe, I have decided to wash my new plastic products by hand to extend their life. The dishwasher does eventually cause many plastics to become brittle. Just as a note, I've decided on Rubbermaid and OXO to replace my old containers. Loving both of them!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable glass containers :)
customer_reviews.text: There containers are awesome as far as stackability. The glass is durable and I generally like the lids. There are two minor problems. One, they are heavy. Stack three in a lunch bag and all of a sudden you're carrying an extra 5-10 lbs to work. Two, since the lids protrude down into the container when you put them on you have to remember not to fill them all the way before you put the top on or else the food will squish out the sides. Other than that, they are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Eisen

customer_reviews.title: good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Slight design flaw with lids. I can see what they were trying to do with the lid design to make it air tight. The problem is, it doesn't always close perfectly. You cannot turn these upside down and expect the lid to stay on. They must always be upright. In the case these flip over by accident, you're screwed. Otherwise, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Elann

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using these for over a year now. None have broken, they stand up to the dishawasher even on the bottom rack (I put lids on top rack). I have never frozen any of them so I don't know about that aspect. These were definitely worth buying and I'm contemplating buying another set. They're extremely durable. A little on the heavy side but it's full glass so thats expected. My daughter takes her lunch in these to school. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Hobson

customer_reviews.title: The 20% of my Tupperware I use 80% of the time - Rubbermaid's finally gotten it right!
customer_reviews.text: Tupperware aficionado I am not, but I do appreciate the ability to make food last longer and transport it with minimal spillage. It doesn't hurt if tupperware's easily washed in the dishwasher and doesn't deteriorate. And it really doesn't hurt if it looks pretty good while along for the ride. This product has quickly risen to the top of my favorite list in terms of tupperware I actually use. Hasn't shown any signs of aging despite many cycles of food and dishwasher. This is the 20% of my tupperware that I use 80% of the time
customer_reviews.author: Y.E.E.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent storage system
customer_reviews.text: Wow, are these great. The bowls don't absorb odors (and by extension, flavors) from previous content, they are easy to clean and store, and they are versatile beyond storage (I use the smaller bowls for cereal, the larger bowls for soups). The one caveat is since they are glass (not plastic), they're heavier and can break. But with a bit of care I can see myself using these for many years (which is something I can't say for plastic storage containers).
customer_reviews.author: Redwing

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I will be getting a another set we use them all the time and my kids are always taking food home in them my wife take her lunch to work in them they are great
customer_reviews.author: matthew mitchell

customer_reviews.title: A step in the right direction for Rubbermaid
customer_reviews.text: Very good---Not quite as idiot-proof as the Glasslock brand. However, these are a little easier to clean, as they don't have that removable rubber gasket that gets all grimy. The downside of these, is that they can come unsealed if someone grabs them from the top lid, whereas the Glasslock brand have to be 'unlocked'. Regardless, these are still better than the ubiquitous plastic type food storage containers that are known to leach various chemicals into people's food.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfgang C

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that these containers have lids that fit ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that these containers have lids that fit different sizes of containers and the lids nest and connect, so you have five different sizes of containers and you only need two different sizes of lids. I only wish they didn't taper at the bottom because you could get more in them if they didn't.
customer_reviews.author: M.M.

customer_reviews.title: First Use! Shattered in a million pieces!
customer_reviews.text: First time use, I had read other comments about glass breaking but thought it was a fluke. I washed, put marinara sauce in , covered loosely with wax paper, and set microwave timer for 3 minutes. After two minutes, I heard an explosion! The glass container had shattered into a million tiny tiny pieces! This is very dangerous! Please don't buy!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: These have changed my lunch packing and fridge storage game. So happy with this purchase the variety of sizes included is great for my needs. I’ve had these a couple of months and no complaints about leaks, etc.
customer_reviews.author: JLK

customer_reviews.title: Great food storage.
customer_reviews.text: First I need to tell you just how much I hate plastic food storage. I don't want my food in plastic, they never seem really clean and except for picnics, I never use them. So I love this set. The glass is very sturdy and well made. While there are several different sizes of container, there are only two sizes of lids and they snap together for easy storage. Everything is stackable which many of the other glass sets don't do. This is a great purchase for a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Beanie&Pie

customer_reviews.title: Stand the test of time
customer_reviews.text: Had them for years and have NOT been careful with them. I have nuked the heck out of them, froze them dozens of times, dipped them on wood floors (wouldn't advise if), and put them on the bottom rack of the dishwasher countless times. Still have them all and still all work perfectly. Don't let your coworkers steal them.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita Arcelia Wittmayer

customer_reviews.title: No more hearing my husband screaming at the container cupboard because he can't find a lid that fits!
customer_reviews.text: Two-sizes of lids for 4-sizes of containers... GENIUS! We're going to throw out all our cheapy containers and exclusively use these because of the lid situation! They're stackable, attachable, easy to find, fit on multiple containers. No more hearing my husband screaming at the container cupboard because he can't find a lid that fits. Plus, the container is glass and is microwave/dishwasher/microwave-oven safe! It doesn't get stained when you put in red pasta sauce or yellow curried chicken salad, that's seriously all I could ever ask for.
customer_reviews.author: EFai W

customer_reviews.title: BIG FAN!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite glass storage containers. I like the rounded square shapes and with some deep and some more shallow there's one for every left-over. The lids are great both for their nice seal and their clear center. The set stacks nicely and is a great move away from all the junky plastic storage containers. (My husband has commented several times on what a great find these are as well so 4 thumbs up from our family!)
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Glad about glass!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad to have glass storage containers. These nest pretty well, and I appreciate that I can store the lids with them--either on top on underneath. The containers will not ALL nest together--just with ones that are the same size or at least use the same lid. There's a great variety of sizes to accommodate most needs. The seals on the lids are good--push down in the center, then be sure to slide your hand around the edges. Don't microwave the lids!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mama

customer_reviews.title: Lids Won't Seal Properly
customer_reviews.text: I loved the idea of these: freezer, microwave, study glass containers and easily stackable. Searched high and low for what I thought would be exactly what I was looking for. I have had these for two months and the larger containers lids will not seal properly. Wondered if I was doing something wrong but then I read the reviews and apparently this is a common issue. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: akbethea

customer_reviews.title: Great For The Price - Lids Need Some Work
customer_reviews.text: These would have totally been 5 star if the lids would have stayed as awesome as they were when we first started using them. The glass bowls are super sturdy and well made, and at first the lids sealed so tight you could hear the seal close...however after a few washes the lid doesn't fit tightly anymore and in fact doesn't even really close all the way. Not sure if there is a trick to it, but I was really excited about tossing my plastic containers out and now need to figure out how to keep these sealed tightly!
customer_reviews.author: Lulu K

customer_reviews.title: These stack well and clean easily. No staining
customer_reviews.text: We have had these for a few years now. They have held up really well. I prefer these over plastic. We all know the dangers of reheating food in plastic and obviously glass is a healthier option. These stack well and clean easily. No staining.
customer_reviews.author: Cali

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: We have been using butter crocks and mason jars and finally decided to upgrade to real storage. We have not been disapointed. These seal amazingly well and the stacking is really cool. They go through the dishwasher beautifully and it helps keep the fridge organized. Also food looks so much more appetizing in these. I absolutely understand why people get crazy over their storage ware being stolen now.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Jindra

customer_reviews.title: Glass not plastic
customer_reviews.text: They are glass so they are heavier than their plastic counterparts. They are easier to care for and don't stain. I use them in the freezer, fridge, microwave, and lunchbox (it gets heavy some days). So glad to stop using plastic for food storage - food seems to last longer in these as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to get the lids off
customer_reviews.text: I gave these a fair chance but I have decided I don't like these. First of all, the lid is recessed so when you store food you have to remember leave about a 1/2 to 1 inch from the top of the container to compensate for the lid depth. My bigger gripe is that i have to wrestle with the lid to get it off and every time without fail, I manage to spill some of the contents.
customer_reviews.author: J. Yoon

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: These are very durable and store well. The lids are a little tough to fit but I expect them to be easier over time.
customer_reviews.author: Sunehri Singh

customer_reviews.title: just didn't like the staining and always wondered if any of the ...
customer_reviews.text: We are getting away from plastic containers, just didn't like the staining and always wondered if any of the plastic gets burned into the food. These glass containers are great. No matter what you heat up, including pasta w red sauce. Quick was and clean as a whistle. The lids get push down to lock in, and I have not had any spills when in transit. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OMG. These are GREAT. I ordered probably 40 pieces and my wife's response was...
customer_reviews.text: "why do we need those". Well, because we have about 6 different brands of leftover containers, half of the time we can find the matching lids and when you do they are warped. This is a food storage SYSTEM. I absolutely love them. Probably the best kitchen investment. She now agrees that they are wonderful for organization. All of the sizes we have use only 3 different size lids.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Snell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, clear, dries well in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I'd be excited about kitchen storage containers, but I am. They feel substantial, they're clear and you can actually see what's in them, and they come out of the dishwasher dried. They're a pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.author: Throbble Fleep

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Placed my second order of a 22 piece ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Placed my second order of a 22 piece set. Comes in a good variety of sizes, find myself using pretty much all of them. They are very sturdy and the only issue with lids in my experience is vacuum sealing if you close the lid on hot food. If that happens to you Once you get the technique down of pressing down in the center and lifting a corner, you won’t have any issues!
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Lids don't seal properly
customer_reviews.text: The lids don't seal properly. I was excited to start using them, but now I'm not sure what to do. I can't use them in the freezer, as the food will be exposed. Not to pack a lunch, what if my soup leaks all over my bag? I guess their best bet is to use as a microwavable container where you sit the lid on top to let the air escape. Boo and shame on you Rubbermaid. You're better than this!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Leaving plastic behind- these are great.
customer_reviews.text: We are trying to get away from plastics and the storage containers were last. This is a perfect set, but you should buy one more large size to have all the sizes you need.
customer_reviews.author: Beaulah621

customer_reviews.title: Hate it.  Lid takes up too much space INSIDE the dish.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible design--the the lid fits nestled down inside the dish, so you can't fill the dish all the way to the top before putting the lid on it. Wish I hadn't bought these! Everybody who tries to put a lid on instinctively tries to put the lid on upside down, the way you would expect a lid to slightly dome over a dish. Nope.
customer_reviews.author: RH Raleigh

customer_reviews.title: Just received but missing one large lid
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has used RubberMaid bowls for years with good luck and I wanted to get rid of my plastic, so I bought a set. Sorry to see so many reviews about exploding and shattering glassware, so will take precautions. We did not get lids for all of the larger bowls.
customer_reviews.author: TxBuyer

customer_reviews.title: These lids do NOT stay closed
customer_reviews.text: Lids are rubberized and go into the container. You then are supposed to press the center to create a vacuum. It does NOT work. You can't transport these anywhere with these lids and it had become a nightly ritual of mine to open the refrigerator and press on every lid in there to "re-seal". Finally got a new set and threw these out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: got these from my wedding registery and I like them a lot. the lids are a little annoying as they don't suction like you think, but overall a good product. I bought some for my mom as well and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I will NEVER buy plastic food storage containers again. I always am throwing out the plastic containers because of the stains or the plastic which starts to fall apart. These are perfect. They stack perfect in my cabinet and the lids go right on top or even on bottom. I am SO HAPPY with them. I have 2 sets of these and am going to get another 2 sets for our cabin.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Stamper

customer_reviews.title: Completely utterly useless!
customer_reviews.text: The lids just pop open. They don't stay secure once you closed the container. I put some raw chicken in one to marinade and the next day I the lid was completely off and I was forced to throw away much of the food in my refrigerator due to contamination. These are useless. I just had to throw them away because they took up so much space. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: and idea of Lid Stacking is nice, but it doesn't serve its purpose and that ...
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. The covers don't really seal, it keeps popping off. The overall quality, design, and the idea of Lid stacking is nice, but it doesn't serve its purpose and that is to store and seal. Also, it is super heavy. A waste of money in my mind. Every time I use this I am more and more disappointed that I bought it. I am looking for a replacement and I intend to just throw it out and take my losses. I'm truly disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous911

customer_reviews.title: Threw out almost half my storage containers after getting these.
customer_reviews.text: They stack so nicely that I have reduced my required storage space my half. The lids lock together and take up very little space. Excellent finish on the glass as well.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Caywood

customer_reviews.title: It’s durable and works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, works as intended, has not been damaged nor lose its purpose. It seals everything close tight. Easy to clean and Safe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product. Lids are useless and always pop off
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. They can shatter and the lids are awful. If you put them on and the contents change temperature at all it pops off. Does not even require hot contents to pop the top off. When I pull out of fridge and drive to work the top pops off. Worst buy I have made. Complete waste
customer_reviews.author: fillycheese

customer_reviews.title: Great, within limits
customer_reviews.text: These are really quite useful, nice solid glass containers. I use them constantly and happily, which is why they earn four stars. That said, it's really quite frustrating how hard it can be to get the tops to seal, and how easily the seal can break in transit. These are NOT a great idea for packed lunches or transporting liquidy food. There are other containers for that purpose, but unfortunately most of them are not glass.
customer_reviews.author: I. Gabel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These provide a very good storage option of any liquid or food. Lids can be snapped together to save space. No leakage with this gasket design so we can safely carry soups. Variable sizes also become very useful. I read reviews about the glass exploding after microwave. It is disappointing. I also used them in microwave and never experienced this. Maybe, I never kept as long as others.
customer_reviews.author: Aktuccar

customer_reviews.title: When they all eventually get lost, I will be getting these again
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I believe the price on these to be perfect for what you're getting. I searched the web for similar packs, but they were all more expensive, or not at all what I was looking for. With the locking lids, stashing these in a cabinet is super quick and easy. All dishwasher safe. If you tend to have a lot of left overs, this is a great investment in keeping your food and reducing waste.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine B.

customer_reviews.title: I like these, as I am trying to switch over ...
customer_reviews.text: I like these, as I am trying to switch over to glass and it is nice to have something with covers. The bowls are great: I like the different sizes; they are easy to store; they can be used for a variety of foods. The tops are not my favorite (I am not sure if I have the whole "sealing" thing down yet), but like the bowls too much to complain!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: No more red sauce stains!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. No more red sauce stains. My only negative, is the lids can be a little difficult to fully close.
customer_reviews.author: Rudi

customer_reviews.title: These are great. My only very minor issue is that the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. My only very minor issue is that the lid goes into the bowl vs. lay on top. So I can't fill a bowl to the very top, I have to leave some space for the lid to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Eclectic Reader

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I love the glass bases! The glass is decorative, thick, and sturdy. My only complaint is the lids. They work well enough, but rather than sealing around the outer edge they rely on suction and seat on the inside rim. It's definitely something I'm working on getting use to. However, I'm worried that over time the rubber edges will bend and no longer seal well. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Tracy

customer_reviews.title: The lids do not stay on
customer_reviews.text: I am very disgusted with this product. The tops do not stay on they pop right back off. There is no use to me.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Rubbermaid Glass Food Storage
customer_reviews.text: This item is my favorite for food storage in the refrigerator. They are dishwasher safe and the lids seal well and I can reheat in the microwave if I loosen the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Mazzie

customer_reviews.title: Great containers
customer_reviews.text: I replaced all of my plastic Rubbermaid containers with these. I really like them except that sometimes the tops don't seal really well and it takes a couple of tries. Overall though, I really like these.
customer_reviews.author: I'm a mom

customer_reviews.title: Great replacements  over Use of Plastic
customer_reviews.text: Great!!!! no issues what so ever! lids are hand wash only but that keeps them from getting all weird and not fitting right! enjoy!!
customer_reviews.author: Skeeter

customer_reviews.title: Cover sits too deep in the  bowl vol
customer_reviews.text: The cover goes so deep in the bowl you can hardly put anything in the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glass is a safe storage material.
customer_reviews.text: This set was a gift so I don't know how they are working out but the bride really liked them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: I have a lot of these and am continually adding ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of these and am continually adding to my collection as they freeze so well. I store single serving size portions in the freezer (I live alone) and can take them out and reheat, all in a single container.
customer_reviews.author: J. N. Piper

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Wife here. We wanted to get away from storing food in Plastic tupperware. These have been awesome! My husband even dropped one on his way to work in the garage and it didn't break. Might have just been a fluke? Regardless no more food residue melted into the plastic. I feel better about reheating foods in them. Storage is much better and the lids are very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: S Shepro

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The glass containers are wonderful but when you put the lid on the seal is not something you can count on Also, when you put the top on the container it pushes into the food so you have to careful how much food you put in the well. Would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: balovestocook

customer_reviews.title: These containers are made of good sturdy glass and they are easily stackable and it's ...
customer_reviews.text: These containers are made of good sturdy glass and they are easily stackable and it's nice that the lids clip onto the bottom of the bowls. The lids make an ok seal, but I've noticed that sometimes the lids start to come off. Not all the way, but I'm not sure it's keeping an air tight seal.
customer_reviews.author: Ktddl

customer_reviews.title: Will be purchasing more in the future! Great Storage product while made in the US
customer_reviews.text: LOVEeeeeee these Rubbermaid Glass food containers. I was looking for made in the USA and something non-toxic for storing my food. The tops seals perfectly and they are durable & heavy {but in a good way}. The thickness in glass make them a great product and not easy to break nor cheap. Would buy more to add to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: HDS

customer_reviews.title: These stack nicely and I love that they are glass
customer_reviews.text: These stack nicely and I love that they are glass. The lids are a little difficult. The Glass container must be less than full because the lid fits down into the dish. You also must have some air and space between what you are storing and the lid to allow the lid to close tightly. After all that, the lid is stuck on pretty snug and takes a little work to remove. Once you learn the technique they are ok.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Don't Microwave Cold Container!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new glass Rubbermaid storage containers. However, I took a medium sized bowl out of the refrigerator, removed the lid covering the chicken in the bowl with paper towel; put the paper towel covered bowl in the microwave for 2.5 minutes. With 7 seconds showing on the clock I heard a POP and opened the microwave to find my new Rubbermaid storage container had blown up! Hundreds of tiny rounded pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Laura A Booth

customer_reviews.title: Great selection & quality!
customer_reviews.text: Nice selection of sizes; glass so there's no worry about staining or blistering of the "plastic" if you microwave in them; love that in all the different sizes of bowls there are only 2 sizes of lids you have to worry about. I bought them to take in my lunchpail to work and although they do make my pail a little more heavier I don't have to worry about the other issues of microwaving in plastic.
customer_reviews.author: tessi

product_meta.title: Rubbermaid Easy Find Lids Glass Food Storage and Meal Prep Containers, Set of 11 (22 Pieces Total)
product_meta.description: Size:Set| Style Name:22 PieceFind the right lid, right now! This 22-Piece Glass Food Storage Container Set features tempered glass bases with sturdy plastic lids. The Easy Find Lids snap on to the container bottoms as well as other same-size lids, so that the right lid is always at your fingertips. These graduated-size containers nest together to give you more space in the fridge or cupboard.
feature_bullets: Set of glass food storage containers features plastic Easy Find Lids that snap on to container bottoms as well as same-size lids, so you can always find lids when you need them, and your cabinets stay organized
OnePress Seal easy-close leak-proof lids help keep food fresh longer
Nests easily with other containers for compact storage
Tempered glass bases are oven safe up to 425°F
Microwave-safe bases, freezer safe, dishwasher-safe bases and top-rack dishwasher-safe lids, all BPA-free
Set contains 11 assorted food containers and 11 lids, for a total of 22 pieces
Set includes 3 1-cup, 3 1.5-cup, 3 2.5 cup, 1 4-cup, and 1 5.5-cup containers, plus lids
Set contains 11 assorted food containers and 11 lids, for a total of 22 pieces
Set includes three 1-cup, three 1.5-cup, three 2.5 cup, one 4-cup, and one 5.5-cup containers, plus lids

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,819 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
